name: NOCO Boost X GBX45: 1250A UltraSafe Jump Starter – 12V Lithium Battery Booster Pack, Portable Jump Box, Power Bank & Jumper Cables - for 6.5L Gas and 4.0L Diesel Engines
short_description: X FOR EXTREME — A new class of lithium jump starters. Rated at 1,250 amps for powerful starts on gas engines up to 6.5L and diesel engines up to 4.0L - built for extreme performance.
ULTRASAFE 2.0 — Upgraded spark-proof and reverse polarity protection with enhanced thermal efficiency and power management for even safer operation and extended battery life.
TURBO CHARGEABLE — Recharges in just 48 minutes via USB-C Power Delivery, or gain enough power for a jump start in just 5 minutes - even from a completely depleted battery.
60-SECOND TIMER — Integrated 60-second timer conserves power from its high-voltage design - delivering up to 6 jump starts per charge with extreme energy at every start.
CHARGE EVERYTHING — 60-watt USB-C Power Delivery lets you charge phones, tablets, laptops, and more. Dual-direction charging turns Boost X into a high-output portable power bank.
INTEGRATED LED FLASHLIGHT — Precision-engineered 100-lumen LED with 7 light modes, including SOS and strobe. Illuminate repairs, emergencies, or low-light environments.
WHAT’S IN THE BOX — GBX45 jump starter, heavy-duty clamps, USB-C charging cable, and microfiber storage bag. Backed by a 1-year warranty and engineered in the USA.
product_description: The GBX45 Boost X is a new class of portable lithium jump starters—engineered for extreme performance and rated at 1,250 amps to start gas engines up to 6.5 liters and diesel engines up to 4.0 liters. Featuring our upgraded UltraSafe 2.0 technology, it offers spark-proof connections and reverse polarity protection, now with enhanced thermal efficiency and power management for even greater safety and battery life. Designed with a high-voltage output system, the GBX45 includes an integrated 60-second timer to conserve energy—delivering up to 6 jump starts per charge with maximum power on every start. Even if completely depleted, it can gain enough power for a jump start in just 5 minutes or fully recharge in only 48 minutes via USB-C Power Delivery. A 60-watt USB-C port provides both input and output, turning Boost X into a high-performance power bank for fast charging phones, tablets, laptops, and other USB-C devices. A precision-engineered 100-lumen LED flashlight features seven modes, including SOS and strobe, to light up dark workspaces or help in roadside emergencies. The GBX45 jump starter comes complete with heavy-duty jumper clamps, a USB-C charging cable, and a microfiber storage bag, all backed by a 1-year limited warranty and proudly engineered in the USA. Whether you’re looking for a car jump starter, battery jump box, jumper pack, power pack jump starter, or a reliable jump starter battery pack to keep in your glovebox, the GBX45 delivers unmatched performance, trusted durability, and peace of mind—on the road, off the grid, or wherever your next adventure takes you.

name: NOCO Boost GB70: 2000A UltraSafe Jump Starter – 12V Lithium Battery Booster Pack, Portable Jump Box, Power Bank & Jumper Cables - for 8.0L Gas and 6.0L Diesel Engines
short_description: START DEAD BATTERIES — Instantly start dead batteries with 2000 amps of peak lithium power. Up to 40 starts per charge on engines up to 8.0L gas and 6.0L diesel.
ULTRASAFE TECHNOLOGY — Engineered with patented spark-proof and reverse polarity protection for foolproof connections to any 12V vehicle - no sparks, no wrong connections.

WHAT’S IN THE BOX — GB70 jump starter, heavy-duty clamps, USB-C charging cable, and microfiber storage bag. Backed by a 1-year warranty and engineered in the USA.
product_description: The NOCO Boost GB70 is a compact yet powerful 2000-amp lithium jump starter designed to safely jump start a dead car battery in seconds—perfect for cars, trucks, motorcycles, ATVs, boats, SUVs, vans, and more. This portable car battery jump starter delivers up to 40 jump starts on a single charge and is rated for gasoline engines up to 8.0 liters and diesel engines up to 6.0 liters. Engineered with UltraSafe Technology, it features spark-proof connections and reverse polarity protection, making it a safe and mistake-proof car battery booster for any 12-volt vehicle. It doubles as a portable USB-C power bank for charging smartphones, tablets, and other devices when it matters most, and includes an integrated 400-lumen LED flashlight with seven light modes, including SOS and emergency strobe—ideal for night use, roadside visibility, or emergencies. With an ultra-compact, rugged design, IP65-rated enclosure, and rubberized over-molded casing, this battery jump starter pack is built tough to withstand water, dust, drops, and rough handling. The GB70 includes heavy-duty jumper cables, a USB-C charging cable, and a microfiber storage bag, all backed by a 1-year warranty and proudly designed in the USA. Whether you’re looking for a car jump starter, battery jump box, jumper pack, power pack jump starter, or a reliable jump starter battery pack to keep in your glovebox, the GB70 delivers unmatched performance, trusted durability, and peace of mind—on the road, off the grid, or wherever your next adventure takes you.

Additional Tips - Please check the manual for more information before using. Professional Technical Support Team - If you have any questions about the product, feel free to contact us! Our California-based support team will respond within 24 hours.
TIP FOR WINTER USE - To prevent battery performance issues in cold conditions, please store the jump starter at a proper temperature. Avoid charging or using the jump starter in extreme cold.
